Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.progress.reporters

package com.telenav.kivakit.core.progress.reporters

    Package
    Description
    com.telenav.kivakit.core.progress
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BroadcastingProgressReporter
    A progress reporter that sends progress messages to a Listener as an operation proceeds.
    ConcurrentBroadcastingProgressReporter
    A thread-safe subclass of BroadcastingProgressReporter.
    ProgressiveInputStream
    An InputStream that reports progress as bytes are read.
    ProgressiveIterable<Value>
    A wrapper that adds ProgressReporter reporting to an iterable
    ProgressiveOutputStream
    An OutputStream that reports progress as bytes are written.
